revised_title: The Effect of Washing and Rubbing Tree Stems on Their Growth
tldr: The author, Mr. Marsham, experiments with washing and rubbing the stems of trees to promote their growth. He finds that the washed tree increased by 2 inches and 5/10ths, which is one-tenth of an inch above double the increase of the unwashed tree. The experiment suggests that washing and rubbing tree stems can significantly improve their growth.
